law.catch_line: Payments out of the State Aid for Police Protection Fund shall be made to each subdivision and quali...
law.text: Payments out of the State Aid for Police Protection Fund shall be made to each subdivision and qualifying municipality by the State Treasurer upon warrants of the State Comptroller. Payments shall be made at the end of each quarter of each fiscal year thereafter, and shall be paid in approximately equal amounts for each quarter to the appropriate qualifying municipality or subdivision.
